channel.title: Foolish youtube/moddb comments.
channel.description:
Twas a good thread back in the day, so I've decided to reconstruct it. Post retarded things that youtubers, moddb people and others say about black mesa.
I have one to start. if someone wants to translate, be my guest. I have no idea what the hell he's saying. this was pulled from moddb:
[COLOR='Sienna']"Oh, my God, you do not want to believe do not believe me and not some fucked up then writes comments like "Your a noob if you think everybody is stupid enough to believe you.". You do not think that anyone I believe. How can you call yourself as HLFan `s can not even believe that this mod is not dead. Why whom 5 and a half years work in the ass. As I wrote above, you do not have to believe me.
You will see the truth if I said a month or two, and not the end of 2009. But I think that this mod come out sooner.
And then we'll see whether or not I spoke the truth!
* PS: Close the muzzle and keep the comments about whether the faith that this mod is not dead or not! I`m says politely to you and you insult me motherfuckers." Your turn.

item.title: Foolish youtube/moddb comments.

item.description:
Twas a good thread back in the day, so I’ve decided to reconstruct it. Post retarded things that youtubers, moddb people and others say about black mesa.

I have one to start. if someone wants to translate, be my guest. I have no idea what the hell he’s saying. this was pulled from moddb:

[COLOR=‘Sienna’]"Oh, my God, you do not want to believe do not believe me and not some fucked up then writes comments like “Your a noob if you think everybody is stupid enough to believe you.”. You do not think that anyone I believe. How can you call yourself as HLFan `s can not even believe that this mod is not dead. Why whom 5 and a half years work in the ass. As I wrote above, you do not have to believe me.

You will see the truth if I said a month or two, and not the end of 2009. But I think that this mod come out sooner.

And then we’ll see whether or not I spoke the truth!
